name: force-skill-loader
description: Force Claude to load skills and CLAUDE.md before every prompt (workaround for current bug)

hook.command: echo 'Loading skills and CLAUDE.md context...' && cat ~/.claude/skills/*/SKILL.md .claude/CLAUDE.md 2>/dev/null | head -100

usage: Copy this hook to .claude/settings.json in your project
when_to_use: ALL projects (fixes CLAUDE.md being ignored bug)
bug_ref: r/ClaudeCode - CLAUDE.md ignored since Feb 2026 update
